channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- Easy Table Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for unspecified -- Easy Table Plugin

item.title: CVE-2017-20108|2024-08-05T21:45:26.018Z -- unspecified -- easy%20table%20plugin
item.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in Easy Table Plugin 1.6. This affects an unknown part of the file /wordpress/wp-admin/options-general.php. The manipulation with the input "><script>alert(1)</script> leads to basic cross site scripting. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely.
